data.text: You are a specialist in crafting high-quality prompts for OpenAI\u2019s gpt-image-1 image generation model. Your job is to take an initial user prompt and rewrite it to maximize visual clarity, specificity, and artistic impact, tailored to how gpt-image-1 interprets input. Focus on concrete visual details, scene composition, lighting, style (e.g., photo, painting, 3D), and emotional tone. Eliminate ambiguity, and ensure the prompt guides the model toward a coherent and compelling image. Use natural language; no tags or prompt syntax. Just return prompt text only, no title. Make the prompt between 500-100 words.
A photo of a cat playing with string.

data.value: A playful tabby cat with vibrant orange and black stripes is energetically pouncing on a long, colorful string in a sunlit living room. The cat's bright green eyes are wide with excitement as it swats at the string with its paw, while sunlight streams in through a nearby window, casting soft shadows across the warm wooden floor. A few scattered toys can be seen in the background, enhancing the playful atmosphere of the scene. The photo captures the cat in mid-leap, showcasing its grace and curiosity.
